mapper.select: SELECT SUM(conAmount) AS MONTHSUM, SUBSTR(condate,1,7) AS CURRENT_MONTH FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY WHERE TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${month}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${month})) AND POCKETCODE=2 AND ID=#{id} GROUP BY SUBSTR(condate,1,7)

SELECT conAmount, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(CONDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')-TO_DATE('01-01-1970 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))*24*60*60*1000) AS CONDATE FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY WHERE TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) AND POCKETCODE=2 AND ID=#{id} ORDER BY CONDATE DESC

SELECT SUBSTR(CONDATE,0,10) AS CONDATE,SUM(B.CONAMOUNT) AS CONAMOUNT FROM T_CONSUME_CATEGORY A, T_CONSUME_HISTORY B WHERE (TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd}))) AND A.CATECODE = B.CATECODE AND B.ID=#{id} GROUP BY SUBSTR(CONDATE,0,10) order by CONDATE ASC

SELECT SUM(CONAMOUNT) AS SUM ,DECODE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-1,'D'), '1', '월요일', '2', '화요일', '3', '수요일' ,'4', '목요일', '5', '금요일', '6', '토요일', '7', '일요일') AS DAY FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY WHERE ID=#{id} AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-1,'D') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-1,'D')

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'DD') AS DAY, SUM(CONAMOUNT) AS AMOUNT_SUM, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(CONAMOUNT) DESC) RANK FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY where ID=#{id} AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'DD')

SELECT B.CATENAME2 AS CATE2, COUNT(B.CATENAME1) AS COUNT, sum(A.conamount) as AMOUNT FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID=#{id} AND TO_DATE(A.CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY B.CATENAME2

SELECT SUBSTR(LPAD(SUBSTR(CONDATE,12,15),5,'0'),0,2) AS TIMES, SUM(CONAMOUNT) AS AMOUNT, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY WHERE ID=#{id} AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY SUBSTR(LPAD(SUBSTR(CONDATE,12,15),5,'0'),0,2) ORDER BY TIMES
